saveEvent: INSERT INTO events (host_user_id, name, description, note, _what, _where, _when, _invitees, is_poll) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9);
getEvent: SELECT row_to_json(event) FROM (SELECT * FROM events WHERE host_user_id = $1) event
deleteEvent: DELETE FROM events WHERE event_id = $1 RETURNING event_id;
saveUser: INSERT INTO users (firstname, surname, email, password) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING user_id;
getUserById: SELECT firstname, surname, email FROM users WHERE user_id = $1;
